name: Frog struggles
description:
Frog struggles is a short action game about bugs that live in a pond, watch out for hostile bugs, water, and the big frog...



Features
  • 10-20 minutes of playtime.
  • Fight other bugs with a stick.
  • Collect various pieces of fruit.
  • Become friends or foes with other tribes.
  • Big frog with a big tongue.

Controls
  • Hold Spacebar to fly upwards.
  • WASD keys to steer.
  • Mouse buttons to attack & defend.



Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
